abstract: The National League vies for attention with two Game 5s set for Friday after St. Louis continued to confound the Phillies and the Diamondbacks go home-crazy against the Brewers.
snippet: The National League vies for attention with two Game 5s set for Friday after St. Louis continued to confound the Phillies and the Diamondbacks go home-crazy against the Brewers.

headline.main: Leading Off: National League Makes a Play
